bibl.title: The Creation of Latin Teaching Materials in Antiquity. A Re-Interpretation of P. Sorb. inv. 2069.
bibl.note: P. Sorb. Inv. 2069 verso = C.L.A. V, 698 = C.P.L. 276 = C. Gloss. Biling. I, 2 (= M.-P.3 3006; LDAB 5438). - 1. The layout of the text. - 2. The glossary as a tool for Greek speakers. - 3. The glossary as a tool for Latin speakers. - 4. The glossary as a whole. - 5. The origins of the glossary. - 6. Restored version of the text.
bibl.seg: DICKEY Eleanor, The Creation of Latin Teaching Materials in Antiquity. A Re-Interpretation of P. Sorb. inv. 2069.

P. Sorb. Inv. 2069 verso = C.L.A. V, 698 = C.P.L. 276 = C. Gloss. Biling. I, 2 (= M.-P.3 3006; LDAB 5438). - 1. The layout of the text. - 2. The glossary as a tool for Greek speakers. - 3. The glossary as a tool for Latin speakers. - 4. The glossary as a whole. - 5. The origins of the glossary. - 6. Restored version of the text.
